description:
In these dark days, the world needs a hero. One who inspires hope, happiness and, most importantly, laughter! Yes, Stupor Duck soars again!

Also features "Learn To Draw" with Bugs Bunny, Foghorn Leghorn analyzing an old nursery rhyme and Bugs Bunny muscling in on Stupor Duck's territory as Super-Rabbit.
name: Dafy Duck In Stupor Duck Sores (Ouch) Again!; Learn To Draw; The Adventures Of Stupor Duck: Crisis In Coin-Op!; Baa-Baa-Boo-Boo; Mistooken Identity

description:
1. Zero Hour (Robin vs. The Clock : reprinted in: The Robin Archives #1)
"Robin battles that villain of the hour The Clock in the riddle of 'The Tick Tock Crimes'"

2. Prize Plunder (Robotman)

3. Gentleman Pat Dugan (Star Spangled Kid and Stripesy)

4. The Case of the Punctured Balloons (Penniless Palmer)

5. A Victory for White Bear (Tomahawk)
name: Zero Hour

description:
1. [Untitled story inside front cover]

2. Guardsmen

3. Goober meets a Funny Man

4. Food for Thought

5. Measles Makes a Friend for Life

6. [Untitled story inside back cover]

7. [Untitled story on back cover]
name: Double Trouble with Goober

description: Batman guests in the first Annual to star the all-new Batgirl! When a young Indian actor is kidnapped from the streets of Gotham City, Batgirl and the Dark Knight travel to India to solve the mystery, but find more than they bargained for in the shapeshifting form of Aruna, a metahuman who is also looking for the boy, and is unwilling to let anything, or anyone, deter her. Plus: a backup story revealing Aruna's origin, including how the fates, and the god Brahma, dealt this new heroine a strange hand.
name: Annual
Adventures of Mighty Mouse : The Underwater Raiders
New Terrytoons : Starring Heckle and Jeckle

description:
NYPD Detective Sara Pezzini wields half of the powerful ancient artifact known as the Witchblade. But now she faces a foe that predates even the mystical gauntlet, confronting a deadly horror that has descended upon Brooklyn‚Äôs Ultra Orthodox Jewish community. Could the biblical Angel of Death truly have been unleashed?

Meanwhile, the bearer of the other half of the Witchblade, Dani Baptiste, goes to the aid of one of her dance students, but is she being reckless with her power?
name: Crown Heights, Part 3 of 3

description:
This is the official Leprechaun release from Trimark pictures, which came out in the the theaters to make way for the movie...Written by Bill Sanders ( Hot Water Music ) and William Clausen ( Chameleon Commandos/ Rivit / Silver Surfer )..Illustrated by William Clausen, and lettered by Shel Dorf ( Steve Canyon/ Comicon founder ).

The plot...Page 1...Farmer O'Grady finds a pot of gold at Rainbow's End..and sells the gold to Mr. Shanihan...

Page 2...That night...Leprechaun burns O Grady's farm to the ground...then shows up at Shanihan's jewelery shop...

Page 3...Full splash...head of Leprechaun...

Page4...Turns Shanihan's hands into snakes, and they kill Shanihan.

Page 5...Leppy goes on killing spree.

Page 6...Lep goes into Bill Sander's brain and drives him insane...

Page 7...Lep stops Bill's heart..then steals the clothes and wig off some woman...and kills William Clausen and Phillip Garris ( Grateful Dead/ Toto artist ).

Page 8...Farmer O'grady has escaped the flames and has boarded a plane to America...in a wooden trunk in the plane's cargo bay....Leprechaun!!

There were 2 versions of this book...the mass produced black border newsprint version...and the slick paper white border version.
name: Limited Collector's Edition

person_credits.name: William Clausen
person_credits.role: writer, artist, penciler, inker, colorist, cover, production

description: Dreamwave kicks "TRANSFORMERS month" into high gear with the all-new ongoing series based on the timeless Generation One franchise. While STARSCREAM and his band of rogue DECEPTICONS make their way towards Earth, PROWL struggles to hold things together as CYBERTRON teeters on the brink of destruction. All that and the debut of a brand-new Generation One character!
name: Night of the Combaticons

description:
Overview

Batgirl comes to the aid of a sniper who was about to be setup as the fall guy, and finds herself facing some very shady government types - trained killers who now have Batgirl in their sights. What can our heroine do to stop the black operations run by our own government?

*Spoilers*

Cassie stops an assassination attempt on a fall guy who has unknown to him been doing acts of terrorism under the pretense of protecting his country. Cassie evades the gun men and then gets captured along with him. Once the rogue agent does the reveal to the agent cassie saves him and they make their escape. She sets up the agent with a fake id and credentials before saying goodbye to him.

Only problem now is the agent has a tape of cassie without her mask.
name: Busted!!

description: The return of Eclipso is bad news for the DC Universe‚Ä¶but it's worse news for Bruce Gordon, the man who originally held the Black Diamond and terrorized the world as Eclipso! Plus, Dr. Fate continues to struggle with his new responsibilities!
name: Perihelion & Head Pieces

description: So what good is magic? The Helmet of Fate hasn‚Äôt helped Kent Nelson pick up the pieces of his shattered life. And don‚Äôt ask Bruce Gordon, because you‚Äôll get an answer that will lead you to believe Eclipso is helping his sundered life! Can Crispus Allen convince him otherwise?
name: Pericynthion & Untethered

description: Eclipso is once more bound to Bruce Gordon! Is Gordon arrogant enough to believe he can control this power in order to fix his own life? And speaking of lives that need fixing, there‚Äôs the new Dr. Fate and his journey to redemption!
name: Apocynthion

description:
Overview

Part 3 of the 5-part "Darker Than Death," written by Bruce Jones (MAN-BAT) with fully rendered color art by Ariel Olivetti (SPACE GHOST)! Is the hostage Batman risked everything to save already beyond his - or anyone's - help?
name: Darker Than Death Part 3 of 5

volume.name: Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight

description:
1. The Boy Disc Jockey (Robin : reprinted in: The Robin Archives #1)

2. The Bandits and the Biscuits (Robotman)

3. Dance of Danger (Star Spangled Kid)

4. Under the Black Flag (Tomahawk)
name: The Boy Disc Jockey

description:
Overview

A "lost" 80-Page giant presents classic team-ups of Martian Manhunter and Green Arrow (The Brave and The Bold #50), Batman and the Flash (The Brave and The Bold #67), The Boy Commandos, Sandman and Sandy, the Guardian and the Newsboy Legion (Detective Comics #76), and Captain Atom and Nightshade (Captain Atom #85 -- first series).
name: Wanted -- the Capsule Master!; The Death of the Flash;   The Invasion of America;  Strings of Punch and Jewlee;

description:
A new evil lurks in the depths of East Asia, taking Abbey Chase, Silicon Valerie and Sydney Savage from the bustling metropolis of Hong Kong to the ancient jungle ruins of the Angkor Empire. Right on the heels of the gripping conclusion of their mission against the Hammer, the Danger Girls must face a shadowy new nemesis known only as the Kama Syndicate.¬†
¬†
After losing the trail of an infamous arms dealer, the Danger Girls send Silicon after a lead in Kowloon, Hong Kong relying on her computer-hacking skills to recover nuclear secrets stolen from the former Soviet Union. Silicon is hooking up to Mikhail Strongonov's vehicle when a beautiful and mysterious Chinese operative enters the scene, and all hell breaks loose. What was supposed to be a simple search and retrieval mission turns into an explosive firefight over Hong Kong's Victoria Harbor. Mikhail follows the Chinese operative getting away in his car, by air, as Silicon follows closely behind on a scooter. After catching them, Mikhail uses an RPG to blow up the car and Sydney drops in just in time to pick up Silicon and the nucleur device.
¬†
Back on Danger Yacht, Deuce, Abbey and Silicon are watching an old WWII film of the Japanese bombing America, and not in fact the nucleur device they believed they retrieved earlier. Along with the film, they find a book with notes about a positronium device and an old Nazi/Japanese flight route that was most likely transporting this device from Nazi Germany to South East Asia.
¬†
Abbey and Sydney head to some ruins in Angkor, Cambodia to look for this device, only to find the Chinese operative from Kowloon has already beaten them there. Abbey is captured by what appears ot be a bunch of Hammer agents.

The Danger Girls' adventures across Asia come to an explosive conclusion as they finally meet their new arch-enemy, the cybernetic ShoGunner. After Sydney Savage is lost in a brutal jungle battle in the ruins of the Angkor Empire, Abbey Chase and Silicon Valerie reluctantly accept the support of Mei Yaoh, a beautiful and mysterious operative from Hong Kong, in their pursuit of a lost World War II weapon known only by its fearsome code name: Kamikaze.
¬†
Abbey and Sydney face off with Mei, a Hong Kong police operative searching for the same thing as Danger Girl. But Shogunner and his troops overwhelm Abbey and Mei even with Sydney's hoverboat loaded mini-gun at full blaze. Shogunner detaches his arm to reveal its a self-propellent rocket with bomb clasped in its hand. Sydney's hoverboat is destroyed and Abbey and Mei are forced to leave her behind in a pool of crocs. Shogunner gets away with the positronium device.
¬†
Back on the Danger Yacht, the Danger Girls minus Sydney are introduced to Mei Yaoh, the secret Chinese operative and ex-colleague of Deuce when Hong Kong was still annexed to Britain. They learn from Mei that the Nazis had created and shipped a supply of liquid deuterium and uranium ore to Japan but much got lost in transit including the device. At the time, a Japanese general called Muramasa Akuhito had devised a way of detonating the power in the device and intended to use it to create an anti-matter bomb. The weapon, code-named Kamikaze, would have been used against America but Japan was defeated and later Akuhito executed. Shogunner is the most visible figurehead of The Kama, a shady organisation wishes to resurrect the same goal as Akuhito.
¬†
On route to a key location in the South China Sea, the Danger Yacht is hit by a rising submarine controlled by the Kama and their leader Empress Doken. Captured and tied up, Doken reveals her plan to fill the void left by the Hammer and rule the world. They display the bomb to the Danger Girl team, but make the mistake of letting Silicon too near it. She speeds up the timer on the device to have it explode in seconds rather than minutes and as Danger Girl escape the submarine explodes. Silicon is thrown into the water, as the Shogunner grabs Abbey and his masks falls off revealing he is in fact General Akuhito himself.
¬†
Mei goes after Silicon just as Sydney arrives riding on the back of an alligator and stop both Doken and Akuhito.
¬†
Silicon confirms that she was able to blow up only the submarine because the half-life of the device had significantly aged, lessening the device's power.
name: On the Cutting Edge of Danger

description: Jefferson Pierce returns to his old stomping grounds ‚Äì the infamous Suicide Slum of Metropolis ‚Äì in order to bring some hope to the residents of his downtrodden former neighborhood. He'll quickly learn, though, that a lawless place sometimes requires a lawless vigilante to drag it into the light. Acclaimed writer Jen Van Meter (CINNAMON, OUTSIDERS) and kinetic artist Cully Hamner (BLUE BEETLE, RED) combine forces to retell the electrifying origin of DC's most honorable hero, the bold and brave Justice Leaguer known as Black Lightning!
name: Black Lightning Year One

description:
The thrilling new series that lets fans relive classic Sonic stories continues!

Volume 9 presents issues #33 through #36 of Sonic's ongoing comic book series in a special 5 x 7 & ¬Ω inch edition. These stories continue the artistic change to a more

"dramatic" tone, better aligning the series to the hit Saturday morning animated series then on the air. The emphasis is on the royal politics of the kingdom, with power plays, self-sacrifice and betrayals galore. Each story is meticulously restored and printed on high-grade paper-so you can feel like you're zipping right alongside the cobalt champion as he saves Knothole Village! This action-packed edition features events like the mystery of the Chaos Emeralds and the return of King Acorn (sort of)!

Stories include:

"Let's Get Small" (issue #33), "The Big Picture" (issue #33), "Sonic Shot" (issue #33), "To Bot or Not to Bot" (issue #34), "A Sense of History ‚Äì Part One" (issue #34), "Ring of Truth" (issue #35), "A Sense of History - Part Two" (issue #35), "Heart of Darkness" (issue #36), and "A Sense of History Party Three" (issue #36).

Reprints issues 33-36
name: Volume 9

description:
1. Shopping Spree

2. Follow the Leader

3. Child's Play
name: I Love Lucy

description:
Overview

The birth of a new super-team from... New Jersey?! Over the years, the dead-end town of Raven's Perch, NJ, has given birth to a host of superhumans. But they've never produced a Spider-Man... heck, they've never even spawned a Darkhawk! So what's it like to be a loser with weird powers living in the state known for off-ramps and landfills? Find out when Fateball, Jughandle and Mize are brought together to form... The Craptacular B-Sides! Plus: a 9-page bonus tale penciled by CAPTAIN MARVEL's ChrisCross!
name: Points of Interest

description:
Overview

The Fantastic Four guest-star as we continue the birth of a new super-team from... New Jersey?!

Spoilers

Our rookie superheroes have landed their first assignment...
...to bring in Doc Ock!¬†¬†

Wait a minute! This guys not really Doc Ock, is he?
name: The Return of Doc Ock

description:
Original Solicitation:¬†
X-Men the Shattering, Part 4 of 12. Alan Davis/Adam Kubert/Mat Banning , Colossus and Marrow fight their fears as The Shattering continues! The X-Men have been splintered, setting the various team members on divergent paths. Now Colossus and Marrow travel to a place and person that holds great significance for them both, the wasteland ruled by Mikhail Rasputin! For Piotr Rasputin, it¬πs a last chance to save his only surviving family member... his supremely powerful and tragically misguided brother. For Marrow, it¬πs a return to the hell she hoped to never see again. For the world... well, that would be telling! Cover by Adam Kubert.¬†
¬†
Issue Summary:¬†

Marrow dreams of the relentless sunlight of the of her childhood home - Mikhail Rasputin's pocket dimension. It was meant to be a refuge to save the Morlocks when their tunnels were flooded. Instead, it became a battleground ‚Äì and the constant struggle lead to young Morlocks becoming the ruthless Gene Nation.

Marrow awakens in a Massachusetts hotel, which to her is a foreign land. Peter Rasputin ‚Äì Colossus! - reclines on the balcony, sketching the sunrise. The pair are on an impromptu vacation after Xavier disbanded the team ‚Äì perhaps for good.

At a nearby museum, a night watchman is accosted by a ghostly image, hovering near a painting titled ‚ÄúIllyana, by Piotr Rasputin.‚Äù

In her hotel room, Marrow flickers between the real her and the brunette stranger projected by her image inducer. Staring down snapshots of the unfamiliar her at local landmarks, with great effort she subsumes the bony growths on her forehead into her scalp.¬†Peter arrives, and complements her on tweaking the image inducer.

Half a world away, a portal opens in the sky. Deathbird emerges from it, as haughty and imperious as ever. She hauls a massive monolithic statue in her wake. Somewhere else, a shadowy figure surveys the crowd around the Illyana painting, and spots Peter.

At the art¬†museum, a young artist won't stop flirting with Marrow. In her frustration, bones grow unbidden from her face and arms. The artist recoils while Marrow flees into a restroom, where she re-engages her image inducer to become the dark-haired stranger.¬†
¬†
Peter is surprised to see her return as the strange woman, realizing that she had previously been mingling in public under her own power!¬†Before he can say much else, the two of them fall into a strange portal that appears on the floor in front of Peter's painting of Illyana.¬†
¬†
Marrow instantly recognizes their destination ‚Äì it's the dimension she used to call home. She¬†runs away, chasing a silhouette she believes to be Callisto.¬†
¬†
With her gone, Mikhail Rasputin emerges from the shadows behind Colossus, declaring, ‚ÄúTogether, we will re-make the world as it should be... and our sweet sister Illyana will soon live again!‚Äù
name: Beauty and the Beast Part One: Broken Mirrors

description:
Overview

The new heroes from New Jersey meet the legendary FF!

Spoilers

Suburbia proves to the chosen battleground for a Kree-Skrull conflict. Special appearance by the Fantastic Four!
name: Helen's Helpful Hints Chapter 23: How to Remove a Tattoo
Tom and Jerry

description: There‚Äôs no turning back now. The symbiote has finally and fully bonded with Eddie Brock‚Äôs DNA, blackening his heart, tarring his soul. Now the man reborn as VENOM sets out for revenge! Discover the humanity behind the classic Amazing Spider-Man #300, as a twisted, corrupted human being crosses the final line, and Spider-Man and his monstrous new arch-enemy Venom meet face-to-face for the first time‚Ä¶in a battle that would rock comics for decades to come!
name: Chapter 5

description: With the help of former outlaw Konstantin Damask, Inquisitor Alastor and his impromptu retinue track the corrupted directorate of House De Kyp to their refuge! However, Chaos Space Marine of the Thousand Sons await in hiding, ready to spring their trap. Alastor must now face his nightmare made flesh and prove himself worthy of the Emperor's calling!
Misery's past is revealed and it isn't pretty. Cyberdata's dark past comes to light, evil men, evil secrets, an oil refinery fire, and a dark revelation to what Misery rots out from within.
name: Prometheus Unbound

description: After years of running, Drizzt is finally prepared to face his past. To do so, he has to go to the one place he never wanted to see again‚Ä¶ the underground realms where the sun never shines: The Underdark! Unknown to Drizzt, his dearest friend Catti-Brie follows him there in order to help him on his quest‚Ä¶ can either of them hope to survive the terrors that lay under the surface?
name: The Legend of Drizzt Book VII

description: It's the triumphant return of the Blue Monday kids! The whole world is thinking about sex, and it's all Bleu's fault! At least, it certainly seems that way. But if Bleu can get some experience in these matters, maybe she can attract Mr. Bishop after all. But what scheme will Bleu hatch to achieve her goal?
name: L'amour est Bleu

description: Gravel, the explosive monthly series from Ellis and Wolfer, crests the wave of it's killer-paced first chapter in this earth-shattering conclusion to the arc. With a trail of his former Minor Seven colleagues in his bloody wake, Combat Magician William Gravel has one final enemy to face, but Jacobus Hook may have an offer that will change the course of Gravel's vengeful quest. From his heavily fortified position in Shockham Hall, surrounded by his small but powerful army of magically-trained acolytes, and in possession of two-thirds of the inhumanly powerful Sigsand Manuscript, Gravel is faced with a compelling prospect: Combining his resources, power, and ultimate ambitions with Hook to create a new generation of the Minor Seven. Together, and each with one half of the Sigsand, they might even challenge the authority of the shadowy Major Seven. But can Gravel trust the motivations of a man that has sworn to see him die? And whose corpse will fill the final hole in A Story of Seven Graves?
name: A Story Of Seven Graves

description: Sandblasted in the desert wasteland and cut off from the rest of the battalion, the crew of the Haunted Tank is not alone! Not only does tank commander Jamal Stuart face devastating enemy attacks from every direction, he's also got to deal with the know-it-all Civil War ghost of his ancestor giving him the jibber-jabber. Don't miss out on the miniseries bursting with politics, pyrotechnics, radical Islam, human drama and people getting shot in the face!
name: Freedom Fried

description:
Introducing the Marvel Universe in a way you‚Äôve NEVER experienced before! Welcome to SUPER HERO CITY, a crowded capital of classy crusaders and crafty criminals in a crammed collective, and home of the SUPER HERO SQUAD! Take a stroll down to the Xavier Institute, past the FF‚Äôs Baxter Building‚Ä¶but don‚Äôt stray too far, because dastardly DOCTOR DOOM‚Äôs domain is the next block over‚Ä¶! Collecting MARVEL SUPER HERO SQUAD: HERO UP! and the comic strips seen exclusively on MARVELKIDS.COM
¬†
This issue also includes bios on all of your favorite Super Heroes and Super-Villains!
ARE YOU READY TO HERO UP?!!
name: Hero Up Digest TPB

volume.name: Marvel Super Hero Squad Hero Up

description:
Stories continue from the annual 'Prog 2009'. From this issue Hector Ezquerra inks his fathers pencils on Strontium Dog).

Cover: John Higgins (Greysuit)

  • Judge Dredd - The Ecstasy (part 1) (John Wagner - Paul Marshall)
  • Greysuit - Book Two - The Old Man of the Mountains (part 2) (Pat Mills - John Higgins)
  • Marauder (part 2) (Robbie Morrison - Richard Elson)
  • The Red Seas - Signs and Portents (part 2) (Ian Edginton - Steve Yeowell)
  • Strontium Dog - Blood Moon (part 2) (John Wagner - Carlos and Hector Ezquerra)
name: Prog 1617

description: Jazz, Bumblebee, and the other earthbound Autobots get an assist of sorts when the all- new G1 character Sunstorm arrives to help them battle the merciless Bruticus. But what chance do they stand against this super-powered Decepticon, and what role will they play in his grand scheme to resurrect a long lost Autobot who's been trapped on Earth for millions of years?
name: Black Sunshine

description: Because you, the fans, demanded it, Transfan-fave JETFIRE returns to the pages of G1 courtesy of the villainous STARSCREAM, who has, out of fear for his own life, formed an uneasy alliance with the AUTOBOTS. But is the combination of the AUTOBOTS' courage, JETFIRE'S intelligence, and STARSCREAM'S conniving enough to thwart the super-powered zealot SUNSTORM from destroying both the Earth and CYBERTRON?!
name: Skyfire

description:
Overview

Continued from Justice League of Aliens.

The conclusion to "Justice Leagues!" Plura, the world-consuming threat that hired the Advance Man, is loose upon our world. Can Superman crack the mystery of what "J.L.A." should stand for in time to save billions of innocent souls?
name: Justice Leagues Part 6: Dawn's Early Light

description:
Overview:

Continued from Justice League of Arkham.

"Justice Leagues," Part 5. The Martian Manhunter and Superman combine forces with Orion, Starfire, Warrior, Mikaal (the blue alien Starman), and Lobo -- but will their respective cultures clash in the effort to save their adopted planet?

To finish in Justice Leagues: JLA.
name: Justice Leagues Part 5: Brother's Keepers

volume.name: Justice Leagues: Justice League of Aliens

description: The end is near! The curse of El Diablo takes full control of Chato as the new villain Vorpal closes in for the kill!
name: Chapter Five

description:
As the entire world turns against them, the last of Earth's Super Heroes must face the unstoppable power of the Gods of Apokolips for the final time. Supergirl vs. Mary Marvel! Superman vs. Darkseid! The fate of the Flash! And the incredible return of the New Gods! The End of Days has come and the ultimate war between good and evil will at last be decided on the battlefield of a broken world!

And as the skies bleed, as the walls between universes crumble and fall, the ultimate threat to life makes its presence felt as an evil beyond imagining arrives to claim its prize. Mandrakk the Dark Monitor is coming and the DC Multiverse will never be the same again!

Superman and Brainiac 5 are seen walking in a strange structure, Superman demands that since he helped The Legion in their Crisis he needs to send him back to help with the Crisis in his time. Brianiac 5 states that the Crisis and Darksied's fall has affected time travel and that he cannot possibly send him to the correct point in time he promised. Brianiac 5 also shows Superman the Ultimate technology created by the Controllers called the Miracle Machine, a super powered device that can make thoughts reality he asks Superman to remember its design only for Superman to fade away.

On board the Watchtower Black Canary makes The Tattooed Man an honorary member of the Justice League so he can tell The Resistance about his symbol that Black Lightning told him of. Soon the Watchtower is then confronted by the Justifiers in various space ships Black Canary orders The Ray to leave.

Supergirl and Mary Marvel continue to fight each other an injured Black Adam feels the power of the Gods that give the Marvels their powers fading away and confirms that it is Desaad that took over Mary Marvel. Supergril briefly stops Mary Marvel and Captain Marvel tells Supergirl he has an idea on how to stop Mary.

Tawky Tawny fights and finally kills Kalibak after his fight Kalibak's soldiers bow to Tawny, while Supergirl is distracted from her fight with Mary Marvel by a group of human that Darkseid has taken control of but Captain Marvel grabs Mary and screams Shazam the two are struck by the magic lightning leaving a depowered Freddie and Mary who cries at her actions under the influence of Desaad saying she can never use her powers again.

In the Checkmate Castle Shilo Norman tells Mr. Terrific that the importance of the symbol on his and Sonny Sumo and The Super Young Team faces telling them how it appeared as ancient markings, crop circles and cave paintings saying it means "Freedom from Restriction". Mr. Terrific is then pulled away from the conversation by his duties as Checkmate White King. Shilo Norman then speaks to Sonny Sumo on the effect the Omega Sanction had on him Sonny states that the original Sonny was sent in feudal Japan and died a happy man and how he somehow stumbled through a hole in his life into Sonny's body. Secretly Atomic Lantern Boy admits to Sonic Lightning Flash his love for Aquazon while Aquazon admits to Lolita Canary she loves Sonic Lightning Flash all the members of The Super Young Team are gathered by Shilo Norman who wants to state their powers but Superbat says his power is his wealth.

Back in the Watchtower the Anti-Life survivors Black Canary, Oracle, Jai West, Iris West, Joan Garrick, Linda Park West are brought to their knees by the Justifiers led by an Anti-Life infected Black Lightning and Green Arrow. As the Justifiers almost place the Anti-Life helmets on them The Tatooed Man fights back and uses the freedom symbol which starts to disrupt the Anti-Life Equation on the Justifiers Green Arrow himself is confronted by his wife Black Canary.

Renee Montoya is in the Checkmate: Omega's headquarters where she is introduced to The Atoms Ray Palmer and Ryan Choi who are assigned to ride the graviton superhighway to another universe. Renee also sees the psychics who are attempting to remove the effect of the Anti-Life Equation she also sees the mystics attempting to contact The Spectre and sees the autopsy of Overgirl. Montoya is then confronted by Lord Eye the key to Checkmate: Omega who reveals her role in the plan with Ray Palmer and Ryan Choi are successful and make contact with another one of the alternate Earths they will move their Earth's population on it with Renee Montoya leading the Global Peace Agency that will establish the remnants of their Earths on the new one.

At the public execution of The Calculator Sivana and Lex Luthor make their move against Libra Sivana chose to fight Libra when he saw his daughter forced into an Anti-Life helmet designed by Mad Hatter Luthor's reason is because he is still fond of life and Darkseid is leading a war against it. Libra then returns to estimate that Luthor was the informant in the Secret Society to The Resistance Luthor then with his fully charged armor kills Libra but Sivana is skeptical about his death. Sivana tells Luthor that his signal jammer will disrupt the voice Anti-Life victims hear as Luthor's and not Darkseid letting Luthor control those near him Luthor then saves Calculator from hanging.

In Iris Allen West's apartment all The Flashes reunite Barry Allen asks Jay Garrick to look after Iris while Barry and Wally decide to maneuver The Black Racer (a grim reaper) to hit Darkseid. Barry tells Wally that technically Darkseid is at the center of a personal singularity beyond the reach of light meaning they will have to run faster than they have ever ran the two then zoom out of the room.

In Darkseid's chamber room he tells Batman to come from out the shadows and confront him. A visibly injured and tired Batman then confronts Darkseid holding a unique looking gun. Batman says that he will break his rule about firearms once and shots Darkseid in the chest with the same God-killing bullet used to kill Orion at the same time Darkseid blasts Batman with the Omega Sanction.

Metron holding a rubix cube talks to the fully repowered Nix Uaton saying that his arrival inaugurates the Fifth World and says that the humans face a threat greater than Darkseid. Nix is overwhelmed seeing some of the events of the universe at the same time including the Green Lantern Corps nearing Earth, Hawkman admitting to Hawkgirl that he would rather die and be reborn in a new so that maybe she could love him again and Supergirl and Freddie and Mary seeing something in the sky.

It is in an angry Superman who blasts the force field around Darkseid's strong hold while the other heroes see the sky turn red and see other Earths, Superman breaks through and holds Batman's dead burnt body.
name: How to murder the Earth

description:
Overview

Continued from Justice League of Amazons.

Part 3 of "Justice Leagues." The King of the Seven Seas also recruits Power Girl along with Tempest, Mera, Arion, and Lori Lemaris to save his watery realm. But will his take-no-prisoners attitude prove Aquaman's own undoing?

Continue in Justice League of Arkham.
name: Sea Change

volume.name: Justice Leagues: Justice League of Atlantis

description:
Overview

It's just a block of wood. Carved and dressed to the nines -- but still just a block of wood. It can't be...evil, can it? The answer to that may lie here. For years, Scarface has been one of the most brutal mobsters in the Gotham City underworld and a constant adversary of Batman. But Scarface is just a ventriloquist's dummy -- the mannequin mouthpiece of mild-mannered Arnold Wesker. It's believed that Scarface's savagery and disregard for human life is merely a symptom of Wesker's fractured psyche. But what if that outlet were removed from the Ventriloquist's possession? What if the puppet were burned, buried and left to rot? Would the evil truly disappear? As Wesker attempts a normal life -- with a new dummy assistant, the pretty but smart-mouthed Lola -- his ventriloquist show seems to ruffle the feathers of the Penguin, who's not amused by the new act. When Wesker, the Penguin and Batman collide in the violent conclusion, will an evil be reborn?
name: A Psychodrama

description: The "New Krypton" finale and a "Faces of Evil" issue! The rapidly rising tensions between the people of Kandor and Earth can only lead to expulsion or war! But even as the governments of Earth begin passing anti-Kryptonian laws, Superman's people have plans of their own ‚Äì beyond anything you can imagine! Writer Geoff Johns and artist Pete Woods (SUPERMAN: NEW KRYPTON SPECIAL #1) wrap up this cosmically important chapter in Superman's life by introducing a major change to The Man of Steel's status quo!
name: New Krypton, Part 10 - Birth Of A Nation

description: Overview"Don't Blink" Part 3 of 4. The baby merchant Blink's been inhabiting has been murdered by a guilt-ridden psychopath. Now Blink can do nothing more than watch through the eyes of a child as the maniac threatens to go ballistic!
name: Don't Blink Part 3 of 4

volume.name: Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight

description:
1. The Seeing-Eye Dog Crimes! (Robin : reprinted in: The Robin Archives #1)

2. Battle of the Robots (Robotman)

3. The Human Fly (Star Spangled Kid / written by Otto Binder)

4. The Secret of the Highwayman (Tomahawk)
name: The Seeing-Eye Dog Crimes!

description:
1. "The Super-Teacher from Krypton" (Superboy) written by Edmond Hamilton, art by John Sikela. Reprinted in Superman Annual #5 and DC Super Stars #12
  2. "Danger: Prejudice at Work" Public service message written by Jack Schiff
  3. "Arrows -- For Hire" (Green Arrow) art by George Papp
  4. "Lucky" gag page by Henry Boltinoff
  5. "So You Want to Be a Pilot" article
  6. "The Alphabet Book of the Sea" (Aquaman) art by Ramona Fradon.
name: The Super-Teacher from Krypton

description:
1. [Untitled story inside front cover]

2. Sloppy Jalopy

3. Mighty Moe

4. Gerald Goes to the Grocery

plus three more untitled stories.
name: The Nearsighted Mr. Magoo and Gerald McBoing Boing

description:
Number 52 in the B.P.R.D. Series.

At the turn of the twentieth century, a British museum curator with a bent for the occult traveled east in search of power and immortality. He was never heard from again.

In 1937, masked crimefighter The Lobster faced a magic-wielding madman bent on fulfilling an apocalyptic prophecy. The plans were foiled, and the world saved, but the villain himself disappeared . . .

Seventy years later, B.P.R.D. agent Liz Sherman began to experience visions of a mysterious gentleman who warned of coming catastrophes. When the Bureau tracked him down, he disappeared -- and kidnapped Liz.

Now, Liz's friends race to find her as their old enemies band together for a final, catastrophic attack.

first_appearance_teams.name: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense

team_credits.name: Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense

description: The mystery of Marvel's forgotten Golden Age guardian deepens! As Tony Stark - a.k.a. Iron Man, Director of S.H.I.E.L.D. - continues to dig, all he comes up with are more questions. Where is the Blue Marvel today? What unexpected agent has been monitoring him? And what exactly happened that day in space?
name: Part Three

volume.name: Adam: Legend of the Blue Marvel

description: All bets are off as Tempest and Galaxy Girl have the showdown this series has been building up to! With no one left to trust and nowhere left to run, Renee learns about the dark side of heroism. The final fate of the Fellowship of Freedom is revealed!
name: No More Heroes

description: Captain Britain is reunited with his wife, Meggan! But can they stay together and live through Dr. Plokta‚Äôs devastating attack? Also, the Black Knight gives into his darkest urges and comes to grips with the truth about the Ebony Blade. Can he ever turn back to the light?
name: Hell Comes To Birmingham: Conclusion

description: Part 2 of the 4-part "Reality Lost" arc continues in this "Faces of Evil"issue as Booster Gold finds himself stranded in the midst of the battlefields of World War I and comes face-to-face with the infamous Hans von Hammer, a.k.a. Enemy Ace! Meanwhile, Goldstar and Skeets continue their search for the missing Rip Hunter!
name: Reality Lost, Part Two

description: Here are the facts we know so far: In less than twenty-four hours, a discreet team of private-practice trauma-scene cleaners has been dispatched to clean up two very large blood spills in the LA area‚Äîone filling a room at a prestigious landmark hotel, and another taking up half a suburban block in the Valley. There are no bodies to speak of, no known victims, no explanation for how or why the blood appeared. But Robert Bellarmine -- whose cleaning crews get called in to take care of the weirdest jobs, the ones the cops can‚Äôt or won‚Äôt handle -- can already tell that both his advanced medical training and his scientifically skeptical mind will be pushed to the limit as he sets out to find a rational explanation for these sudden eruptions of gore. And when ten-year-old Henry Lisander goes missing the next day, Bellarmine knows he has even less time to figure out who or what is behind the bloodbath!
name: Absent Bodies, Part 2 of 4

description: There's a new Green Goblin in town - and his name is PETER PARKER! Spider-Girl faces her biggest challenge yet when she must face off against her own father! Plus, more fun with Mayday's little brother as Tom DeFalco and Colleen Coover (AGE OF SENTRY) bring you LI'L BENJY, THE SPECTACULAR SPIDER-BABY!
name: Grim, Be My Goblin!; Li'l Benjy - The SPectacular Spider-Baby: Cool Cake!

description:
Issue #2 continues the adventure from Alex Ross, Joe Casey and Edgar Salazar as the spin-off from PROJECT SUPERPOWERS races through its first story arc! Featuring the Dynamite debut of the Silver Streak and a surprise appearance on the last page of another "lost" ally of the 'Devil's in his quest to rid this new world of The Claw once more! Plus, more clues to the mysterious and shattering origin of the "Dragon"!

List of covers and their creators:

CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar Location
ACover A (50%)Alex Ross1
BCover B (50%)John Cassaday5
CCover C (1:12)George TuskaMissing
DCover D (1:15)Edgar Salazar3
RIRetailer Incentive - Alex Ross Negative Art VariantAlex Ross2
RIRetailer Incentive - John Cassaday Negative Art VariantJohn Cassaday4

A "Faces of Evil"issue! In this epilogue to "Batman R.I.P."and "The Great Leap,"both Nightwing and Dick Grayson are forced to deal with startling and tragic recent events, and things will never ever be the same ‚Äì especially with Ra's al Ghul involved!

Nightwing is in the Batcave looking at the different Batman suits.¬† He's angry that Bruce is gone.¬† He decides he and Alfred need to clean up the cave.¬† He calls Alfred, who is headed to Japan to take care of some 'final business.'¬† Nightwing asks if there was any area they felt need more attention.¬† After talking, he knows he is not alone.¬† He soon finds himself fighting a horde of ninja assassins.¬† Defeating them all, he picks up a camera off of one that he noticed while fighting.¬† He then finds himself talking to Ra's al Ghul.¬† The reason for all the men was because Ra's wanted to talk to him face to face.¬† He wants a brief truce.¬† Nightwing convinces him to give him the location of the meet and flies off to the Thar Desert.

Arriving, Nightwing head down in a hidden caver (where a Lazarus Pit is located).¬† Nightwing goes off on him for trying to get Tim to accept his deal with bringing his parents back from the dead.¬† He wants to know if talk about ressurrection is why he wanted him there.¬† Ra's al Ghul tells him he wanted to know if the Detective was dead.¬† Looking at his face, he knows it is true.¬† He throws a sword at him and offers him a chance to exorcise his anger.¬† They soon begin dueling.¬† He tells Nightwing that he is angry too.¬† Batman should have died at his hands.¬† He says Gotham should be celebrating the man that saved them time and time again.¬† He should have had a glorious death, not one hidden in the shadows.¬† He feels he should've have been the one to unmask the dead Batman for the world to see and is upset that he will not be known as the man that killed him.¬† Nightwing tells him that he's angry that he knows he could never beat Batman.

As Nightwing prepares to leave, Ra's al Ghul tells him the sword he fought with was the same used by Batman during their fight.¬† He tells him to take it as a reminder that their paths will cross again.¬† Nightwing says no thanks and he should keep it as a reminder that he'll be there to fight evil when it shows its face.¬† When he returns to the Batcave, the sword is already there waiting.
name: Eminence Front

description: ‚ÄúI did not come for her... I came for you.‚Äù Who lives and who dies when the Titan‚Äôs secret is finally revealed? This is the End, but could it also be a Beginning?
name: The End

description: In a new Ben 10: Alien Force adventure, Ben, Gwen and Kevin find themselves caught in a time loop! Plus Samurai Jack and Kids Next Door!
name: A Brief Mystery of Time; Aku's Fairy Tales: The Samurai Who Cried Wolf!; Operation: F.O.R.G.E.T.

description: An action-filled frenzy! With his host wounded--and bodies piling up in both the Black Forest and the Castle of the Devil--Solomon Kane tries to keep himself and his deceptively simple companion, John Silent, from quick deaths on the gallows. The lovely, scheming Mahasti is missing, supernatural horrors lurk in the forest, and Baron von Staler becomes a bit unhinged.
name: The Castle of the Devil, Part 4

description: A "Faces of Evil"issue! The stunning "Sins of the Star Sapphire"storyline concludes with Kyle Rayner battling Kryb for the soul of Lantern Amnee Pree's baby. Plus, Mongul begins his conquest of a world and a takeover of the Sinestro Corps. What world is at stake and which Lanterns will attempt to stand in his murderous way?
name: Sins of the Star Sapphire Part 4: Hearts and Minds

description: Best-selling author Laurell K. Hamilton's "The Laughing Corpse" continues-and welcomes back a fan-favorite vampire lothario! As the Executioner of St. Louis, Anita Blake has made her fair share of dirty dealings with the dregs of the underworld. And if Anita wants to solve the grisliest case of her career, it looks like she's going to have to make one more dark compact: this time with the newly crowned Master Vampire-Jean-Claude!
name: Part Four

volume.name: Anita Blake, Vampire Hunter: The Laughing Corpse

description: Invincible and Atom Eve are finally together. Young love... how interesting.
name: Young Love...

description: It's an all-new prelude to the upcoming, all-new JUSTICE LEAGUE #1! Prometheus once defeated the Justice League single-handedly, and with his latest lethal crime spree, he's moved to the top of the heroes' Most Wanted list. But what grave crimes has he committed, and what will he do to prevent capture? Learn the real face of evil that is Prometheus!
name: The Man Who Murdered Prometheus

description: In the first issue of Locke & Key: Head Games, Professor Joe Ridgeway has one look at Lovecraft Academy's newest transfer student, the charismatic Zack Wells, and is seized with an unsettling notion: that young Wells is in fact the ghost of Lucas Caravaggio, a teenager who disappeared over twenty years before, along with several other students, and who has long been presumed dead. Joe soon sets out to dig up the truth on the new kid... with no idea how far Zack Wells is willing to go to keep his secrets buried.
name: Intermission

description: REVEALED: How Magneto formed the House of M! It all comes down to this...the final battle between Magneto's mutant army and the United States of America! Can the Master of Magnetism stand against non-metallic Sentinels? What will happen when Magneto's children learn that he's their father? And how will Earth's superpowers respond when the planet's most powerful mutant finally makes his bid to conquer the world? The epic conclusion to the House of M's greatest untold story is here!
name: Rex

description: Batman's got a fan club! But it's a mischievous fan club of one known as Bat-Mite, and he just can't stand the other Super Friends saving the day alongside Batman. Will The Caped Crusader be forced to fly solo from now on? Not if Mister Mxyzptlk can help it!
name: Imp-Possible!

description:
A "Faces of Evil" issue featuring the black archer Merlyn! The deadly assassin comes back into the lives of Green Arrow and Black Canary just when they've gotten their lives back on track! But if the heroes can defeat their arch-enemy, could that just open the gates to more, possibly worse evil in their lives?

SPOILERS

The Story opens with four friends celebrating at the Angel Cake Outlet. They claim, "We Saved The Future". As they are leaving, two of them are killed from above by a single arrow. The third is killed with two arrows. The last one runs but ends up pinned to a telephone pole by an arrow shot through a city bus. Merlyn says he's now earned and even 20 million.

Green Arrow and Black Canary are playing scrabble in their bedroom when they hear a breaking news bulletin that four people were killed by arrows.

At the scene of the crime, Green Arrow tells the police Chief to not bother with backup and that he will take it from here. It's clear Green Arrow doesn't work all that well with cops. The police chief shows Arrow and Canary the four victims were each working for different tech companies. Green Arrow assures the chief that he'll bring Merlyn in. It then cuts to a room where a red headed girl is sitting at her desk filled with pictures of G.A. listening to a radio bulletin about the crime.

G.A. and B.C. investigate the victims' room that has been trashed and deem that this wasn't Merlyn's work. They also discover a picture showing the four and one more graduating from M.I.T (Metropolis Institute of Technology). To find the fifth person. Dinah calls Oracle and asks her to find this guy. Babs says that his name is Jonathan Cedar and he was developing a Biomechanical Propulsion system and the other four were now helping him with it. At the end of the call there is tension between Babs and B.C. and Dinah hangs up abruptly.

Merlyn and Jonathan are at a shipyard discussin how Merlyn will get paid for his work. Jonathan had them assassinated so that he would get all the credit. It turns out that Merlyn could get more money if he takes out Jonathan. As he shoots, Dinah uses her Canary Cry to shatter the arrow. A battle ensues and Dinah's right wrist is pierced through by an arrow. Merlyn attemps to finish her off, but his arrow is split in two by G.A. and he tackles him to the ground. On his back, Merlyn whips out a gun and Ollie at gun point. As Merlyn begins to pull the trigger, Ollie feels for and finds a tip of an arrow and flings it at Merlyn, The arrow clogs the pistol and causes it to backfire. Black Canary is in pain, but will survive.

G.A. brings Merlyn's quiver to the police chief and they end on good terms.

The redhead now appears again at the battle scene and takes one of GA' arrows he left behind. There is a flashback to when GA saved her from apparent rape. The issue ends with her cutting herself with the arrow in tears and saying, "I love you".
name: Enemies List, Part One: Draw Back Your Bow

description:
We take you back to the days of grungy 90s as The X-Men and Spider-Man face off against Mr. Sinister and Carnage! But this Spidey isn't Peter Parker--it's Ben Reilly, the Spider-Clone! And Wolverine's claws are made of bone, not adamantium! It's radical...it's extreme...and if we coulda put a chromium cover on it, we would have! Put down your pogs and pick this up if only to feast your eyes on Mario Alberti's art! It'll make you say "Cowabunga, dude!"

A few years ago, the X-Men are up against Mr. Sinister once again. He leaves before the battle is over. The X-Men search his place for any clues to his next hiding place. They find a box that may give them a lead and allow them to return a favor.

In the city, Spider-Man (actually Ben Reilly, the Scarlet Spider when he took over for Spidey) is chasing Slyde. He is stopped by Iceman. As "Spider-Man" is about to leave, Storm reminds him of when he came to them about Kraven and Sinister's team-up. He says he remembers it but Wolverine knows he's lying. He has no choice but to tell them that he's not the same Spider-Man he knows. He tells them the one they know was a clone (that's what he and Peter Parker were lead to believe at the time). The X-Men tell him that they found some notes of data exchange between Sinister and Miles Warren (the dude that cloned Spider-Man). What concerns Ben Reilly is there are notes on Cletus Kasady, also known as Carnage. They plan on paying him a visit.

At the Ravencroft Institue, Sinister is already visiting Carnage. He wants to make a deal with him. Before anything can happen, the X-Men and Scarlet Spider arrive. A fight begins, Carnage bites Wolverine's bone claws, Sinister gets upset. He tries controling their mind but finds Spider-Man resisting him. He pushes further and Ben pushes back with the memories of his life. Sinister is disgusted and calls him a "mockery of life." After he leaves and Carnage is put on ice, Ben wonders what he meant by that. Cyclops tells him not to listen to Sinister. Spidey asks Wolverine if he can tell the difference but is told they smell the same. As far as he's concerned, he is Spider-Man.

Back at Sinister's (latest) lab, he seems to have just about perfected the sample he took from Kasady.
name: Clone Sagas

description: SPIDER-MAN is a little red in the face when he assumes that the costumed figure leaving the scene of a crime is the criminal! Pointing out that that's what J. JONAH JAMESON does to him, The PROWLER reminds Spidey that it's never a good idea to jump to conclusions!
name: ... Everything You Read...

description: A "Faces of Evil" issue! With Jericho around, no one is safe. He can hide in plain sight, and he's far more powerful than he's ever been before. Even those best equipped to understand and deal with him ‚Äì his old teammates the Titans ‚Äì are at a loss this time. What is his ultimate goal, and whom will he possess next to attain it?
name: Walk With Me

description:
Remember when Deadpool saved the Earth from those pesky Skrulls? Well, the guy who stole the intel Deadpool worked so hard to acquire -- and positioned himself as Earth‚Äôs Number One War Hero -- wants to make sure you don‚Äôt. The last thing this guy needs is a certain ‚ÄúMerc with a Mouth‚Äù letting everyone know the truth of how he saved the day, and he‚Äôs hired a certain maniacal man-eater to make sure Deadpool never does. Here comes Tiger-Shark! Plus, a surprise appearance by a certain palindromic pal!

Plot Summary

It starts with Deadpool on shore with a kid poking his eye out. Deadpool then woke up in a hospital and he was about to leave (because of his healing factor). A hot nurse told him to stay but Deadpool said no and left to find Tigershark outside the door. Deadpool then went back inside but then a voice in his head said don't fight Tigershark in the hospital because it will cause destruction but another voice said fighting Tigershark will make him popular and the nurse will fall for him. So Deadpool Fought Tigershark and Deadpool got the upper edge but the cops shot him down. Deadpool then woke up in a body bag near the docks with Tigershark holding a axe. But then Bob agent of Hydra came holding a rifle and told Tigershark to back away from his friend. Deadpool kicked Tigershark into the water and told Bob to throw him the Rifle. Bob threw it but it landed in the water. Tigershark then grabbed Bob and was drowning him. It ended with Deadpool goin after rifle instead of Bob.
name: How Low Can You Go?, Part 1: Dead In The Water

description: Join legendary scribe LOUISE SIMONSON as she documents the origins of the greatest warrior godhood has e'er known: THE MIGHTY THOR! See how the God of Thunder came to our world, and what awesome adversities shaped him into a champion of man!
name: Lip Service

description: The Marriage that will unite two Dog Tribes is about to take place, and Michael and Abi are running out of time. Gerr has come to rescue them, but they don't know his true agenda. When his ruse is uncovered by the tribes, will he be accepted as an ally? And what will he make of Michael's tale of what he and Abi found?
name: Hounds of Love

description: There's war on Earth, war in space and war in another dimension. And at the heart of it all stands a desperate mission to track down and save Superman, Batman and Wonder Woman by some of their most devoted family and friends. But to save the Trinity, the rescue squad will have to defy gods as the fate of Earth hangs in the balance.
name: There Must Be Hope; To Reflect Her Nature

description: You know Nova from his hit on-going series; now, see how it all began in this power-packed origin! Before NEW WARRIORS and ANNIHILATION, Nova was one of the seventies' most scintillating stars! Experience the birth of Marvel's sci-fi hero like never before with a brand-new framing sequence by fan-favorite NOVA scribes Dan Abnett and Andy Lanning! Re-presenting NOVA #1 and #4.

A new beginning and a new world of threats for the fighting men and women of the elite military force known as G.I. Joe - Freedom's last hope and the first-to-fight in battle with a hidden enemy and a secret war that's already won! The world's terror underworld whispers of Cobra. Who or what is Cobra and what can the Joes do to stop an enemy they can't identify or find. Think you know Joe? Think again.

The latest offering from the red-hot Marvel Knights line reunites the seminal creative team of Garth Ennis and Steve Dillon for a special, weekly-shipping 6-part limited sequel to their legendary story arc, "Welcome Back, Frank."

She's back and she wants payback. Ma Gnucci. Eighty-five pounds of hairless, armless, legless, supposed-to-be-dead evil. And that's not the end of Frank Castle's problems! It would appear that someone else Frank put six feet under is alive and kicking -- and wants dibs on the Punisher. Enter: Elite.
name: The Resurrection of Ma Gnucci; Part Five

story_arc_credits.name: Punisher: War Zone-The Resurrection of Ma Gnucci

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Punisher: War Zone-The Resurrection of Ma Gnucci

description: In this final issue, Manhunter fights metahuman terrorists while Kate Spencer prepares for the most heart-wrenching case of her legal career! Battle lines are drawn in the Super Hero community when long-buried personal secrets are revealed!
name: Some Years Later. Family Business

description: Only ten percent of American birn mutants live to see their twentieth birthday. Some are attacked by frightened neighborhood mobs, many murdered in confrontations with other mutants, but most have been executed by the U.S. Government's homo-superior extermination androids: the Sentinels. Throughout America, desperate and fearful mutants have banded together in small groups, living under the streets ogf our largest cities where they remain hidden from sentinel detection. They do not want to be heroes or villains, they only hope to survivce. More tan just an urban legend, less than the horrific monsters America proclaims them to be.
name: Initiation

description: Throughout the United States, desperate and fearful mutants have banded together in small groups, living under the streets of our largest cities where they remain hidden from detection. They do not want to be heroes or villains... they only want to survive. More than just an urban legend, less than the horrific monsters America proclaims them to be. They've left behind their homes... their jobs... their loved ones. But for the Morlocks, there are still scores to settle! And even as the outcasts say last goodbyes, their fragile alliance begins to fray -- and anti-mutant paranoia leads to the dispatching of Sentinels to Chicago!
name: The Rocket's Red Glare

description: Continuing a look into the ubran myth that is spreading across America: where lurk the Morlocks? The pact the underground mutants made begins to fall apart when one of them goes too far against humanity. As the Chicago Police invade their home, one of the Morlocks reveals their ultimate sin while another finds salvation in the most unlikely of places!¬†
name: Sinners & Saviors

description: The year is 2018. With John Connor as the voice of the resistance, the scattered remnants of humanity find themselves united against their common enemy-Skynet and its Terminators. Through a patchwork system of radio transmitters, hacked satellite phones, and encrypted computer networks, resistance leader Elena Maric in Detroit and Nigerian mining engineer Bem Aworuwa have formed an unlikely friendship and drawn up battle plans to take the fight to the Terminators!
name: Sand In The Gears, Part 1

description: Double origin issue! Find out how both the Scarecrow and the Tin Woodsman came to be. Romance and dismemberment, spontaneous life and evil spells‚Äîthis issue has all sorts of surprises. Plus, you‚Äôve never seen a Cowardly Lion before like Skottie Young‚Äôs big bashful ball of fur! Join young Kansas farm girl Dorothy on the road through the Land of Oz as she collects companions with severe identity issues.

You'd think dying would be the end of the story, but not for the Ghostbusters! Trapped in a kind of limbo, Egon, Ray and Winston set out in the land of the recently (and not-so-recently) deceased to find Venkman and save his soul from eternal torment! But it seems the tables have turned and it's the ghosts who intend to do the busting this time!

The Joker makes a break for it as the rogue "policeman" tries stopping Batman once and for all. It leads Gotham City to ask one question ‚Äì where on earth can the emerging psychopaths be imprisoned safely?
name: Do You Understand These Rights?, Part 4: ...Be Used Against You.

description: Following hot on the heels of last year's uber-successful Ultimate Spider-Man #100 Project, The Hero Initiative gets mean and green! ALL of Hero's 100 original covers to Marvel Comics' Hulk #1 are on display in this great book, with art by J. Scott Campbell, John Cassaday, Frank Cho, Terry Dodson, Dale Keown, Joe Quesada, John Romita Sr. and Jr. and MORE! Even MORE covers and MORE pages than last year's Spidey book.
name: One Shot

description:
The secret origin of Prometheus.¬†
¬†
In this issue we meet Prometheus, the book opens on a head shot, and we find he is already telling his origin story. Prometheus was the son of two habitual offenders. Even though he was raised on the run, he loved his parents and the life style they raised him in.¬†
¬† So when he sees them gunned down in front of him by the police, he decides to become a supercriminal and avenge them against good. His life is a flipsided mirror image of Batman. He gathered the right weapons , and technology, and plans to infiltrate the JLA watchtower by using a winning contestant of a fake superhero contest.¬†
name: There Was a Crooked Man

description:
The Body Doubles seeking to fulfill a hundred million dollar contract arrive at a museum only to be attacked by three members of The Killer Elite seeking the same "open ticket," the duo who manage to escape by exploiting their looks. While elsewhere the various killers employed by Requiem Inc. are slowly being killed off while trying to complete the contract,while the Body Doubles head to Uncle Nick in order to gain information on the open ticket. Uncle Nick then incapacitates the girls and begins to go to finish his contract.with the girls following to keep him safe, however this fails as Nick is severely injured by "Richter" and falls several stories.

They then arrive underneath a toy store to fulfill their contract here they are met by the Killer Elite and begin their rematch. The two then defeat Killer Elite and Merlyn as Deadshot arrives revealing he is Carmen's lover, and gives up without a fight. They then learn that the contact is on the founder of Requiem Inc. as he reveals himself to the girls who quickly shoot him much to his secretaries surprise. The two then leave to go out to get a bite to eat, while being rewarded their hundred million dollars.
name: Tested to Destruction

description:
On Apokolips Granny Goodness alongside Desaad look over the city, worried for the future over the people believing Darksied has died. Upon Granny's questioning Dessad's loyalty to Darkseid, he flies into a rage attacking her only to be knocked out by the newly arrived Kanto. The imperial city is then attacked by a squadron of Deathwings led by Vundabar.

An awakened Desaad then sends his army of Parademons to battle the invaders, as he questions Kanto's loyalty. The three then agree to unite to defeat Vundabar and his invasion,attacking with Granny's newest weapon the Mark VIII Pacifier.Desaad then pilots the ship through the hordes of ship, infiltrating the mothership and bringing it down sending the soldiers to parachute out as Desaad captures Vundabar. Meanwhile the falling ship is caught by the giant monument of Darkseid come to life, who tells them he has need for all of them to work together and he would remember this upon his escape. He then tells him to continue their assaults on New Genesis as he leaves the statue.
name: Shadows in a Greater Darkness
